DirectoryDescriptor.Name: FOX Modules
DirectoryDescriptor.DatabaseFileExistsStatement: WITH q1 AS ( SELECT CASE :p_filename_without_extension WHEN 'fox_import' THEN 'Fox/fox_import' ELSE :p_filename_without_extension END component_name FROM dual ) , q2 AS ( SELECT CASE WHEN :p_mime_type LIKE 'image%' THEN 'img/' WHEN :p_file_extension = '.css' THEN 'css/' WHEN :p_file_extension = '.js' THEN 'js/' END || q1.component_name component_name FROM q1 ) SELECT COUNT(*) result FROM q2 JOIN envmgr.fox_components fcf ON name = q2.component_name AND type = :p_mime_type
DirectoryDescriptor.FetchStatement: WITH q1 AS ( SELECT CASE :p_filename_without_extension WHEN 'fox_import' THEN 'Fox/fox_import' ELSE :p_filename_without_extension END component_name FROM dual ) , q2 AS ( SELECT CASE WHEN :p_mime_type LIKE 'image%' THEN 'img/' WHEN :p_file_extension= '.css' THEN 'css/' WHEN :p_file_extension = '.js' THEN 'js/' END || q1.component_name component_name FROM q1 ) SELECT fcf.data FROM q2 JOIN envmgr.fox_components fcf ON name = q2.component_name AND type = :p_mime_type
DirectoryDescriptor.FetchBinaryStatement: WITH q1 AS ( SELECT CASE :p_filename_without_extension WHEN 'fox_import' THEN 'Fox/fox_import' ELSE :p_filename_without_extension END component_name FROM dual ) , q2 AS ( SELECT CASE WHEN :p_mime_type LIKE 'image%' THEN 'img/' WHEN :p_file_extension = '.css' THEN 'css/' WHEN :p_file_extension = '.js' THEN 'js/' END || q1.component_name component_name FROM q1 ) SELECT fcf.bindata FROM q2 JOIN envmgr.fox_components fcf ON name = q2.component_name AND type = :p_mime_type
DirectoryDescriptor.FileDataTypeStatement: WITH q1 AS ( SELECT CASE :p_filename_without_extension WHEN 'fox_import' THEN 'Fox/fox_import' ELSE :p_filename_without_extension END component_name FROM dual ) , q2 AS ( SELECT CASE WHEN :p_mime_type LIKE 'image%' THEN 'img/' WHEN :p_file_extension = '.css' THEN 'css/' WHEN :p_file_extension = '.js' THEN 'js/' END || q1.component_name component_name FROM q1 ) SELECT CASE WHEN :p_mime_type LIKE 'image%' THEN 'BLOB' ELSE 'CLOB' END datatype FROM q2 JOIN envmgr.fox_components fcf ON name = q2.component_name AND type = :p_mime_type
DirectoryDescriptor.FileMimeTypeStatement: SELECT CASE LOWER(:p_file_extension) WHEN '.xml' THEN 'module' WHEN '.html' THEN 'text/html' WHEN '.htm' THEN 'text/html' WHEN '.scss' THEN 'text/css' WHEN '.css' THEN 'text/css' WHEN '.png' THEN 'image/png' WHEN '.gif' THEN 'image/gif' WHEN '.jpg' THEN 'image/jpg' WHEN '.jpeg' THEN 'image/jpg' WHEN '.js' THEN 'text/javascript' WHEN '.ico' THEN 'image/x-icon' WHEN '.mustache' THEN 'text/mustache' WHEN '.swf' THEN 'application/x-shockwave-flash' END FROM dual
